\# About Me

Welcome to my blog! My name is Khushi, and I'm passionate about data visualization, interaction design, photography and game design, and music.

I love capturing moments through the lens, exploring creative ways to communicate through visuals. Music deeply influences my creativity.

## What I Do
[-]{.underline} Build games with educational goals, integrating fun with learning
[-]{.underline} Design user interfaces to enhance user experience and engagement
[-]{.underline} Explore and tell stories through data visualization, making information more accessible and insightful
[-]{.underline} Enjoy photography, especially animal portraits and outdoor shoots
[-]{.underline} Connect music to visual arts, using it as inspiration for both photography and design
